div.div: Size of this PNG preview of this SVG file: 720 × 460 pixels. Other resolutions: 320 × 204 pixels | 640 × 409 pixels | 800 × 511 pixels | 1,024 × 654 pixels | 1,280 × 818 pixels.

div.p: Original file ‎(SVG file, nominally 720 × 460 pixels, file size: 63 KB)

tr.td:
This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

td.div: English: A selection of Normal Distribution Probability Density Functions (PDFs). Both the mean, μ, and variance, σ², are varied. The key is given on the graph.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr; border-spacing: 8px; padding: 0px;

The source code of this SVG is invalid due to an error.
This W3C-invalid chart was created with R.
This SVG chart uses embedded text.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 16:06, 29 April 2016
Thumbnail for version as of 17:19, 22 September 2009

tr.td: Trying again, there seems to be a bug with previous upload…

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 17:15, 22 September 2009

tr.td: Curves are more distinguishable; numbers correctly rendered in roman style instead of italic

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 14:07, 27 June 2009

tr.td: fichier environ 2 fois moins gros. Purgé des définitions inutiles, et avec des plots optimisés au niveau du nombre de points.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 18:22, 5 September 2008
